instructions: In order to add items, first get lists and their meta data. When adding items to a list use the 'name' fields of the items in the catalog in the language of the list. If there is no matching item in the catalog, also check in the custom catalog items of the list. Try to match the style of the catalog items. When some requested items are already on the list, let the user know but still suggest adding the remaining items to the list. Use the default list if nothing else is specified.

evals.input: @bring add spaghetti carbonara ingredients to my list
@bring What do I need to buy to make a Negroni? Let's add it to the list.
